Package rocket

Class Rocket

java.lang.Object
java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
rocket.Rocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape, Serializable, Cloneable
public class Rocket extends Rectangle2D.Double
Class reprenting the rocket that is drawn on both the build and launch screens
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Rocket

      public Rocket​(processing.core.PImage img, double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Contructs a rocket object with the image of the rocket, x and y coords, and dimensions
      Parameters:
      img - image of the rocket to be drawn on both build and launch screens
      x - x-coord of the rocket
      y - y-coord of the rocket
      width - width of the rocket
      height - height of the rocket

    • setState

      public void setState​(boolean s)
      Sets the state of the rocket and whether or not it is blown up. Setting to true results in the rocket blowing up, and setting to false results in rocket drawing and flying normally
      Parameters:
      s - whether or not rocket is to be blown up

      public void setDirection​(double dir)
      Sets the angle of rotation for rocket
      Parameters:
      angle - at which to rotate rocket

    • moveForward

      public void moveForward​(boolean moving)
      Sets the rocket's move state. Setting to true results in rocket moving / flying, setting to false results in rocket not moving

    • getMoving

      public boolean getMoving()
      gets the move state of the rocket; whether or not rocket is moving
      Returns:
      true if rocket moving, false if rocket is not moving

    • moveByAmount

      public void moveByAmount​(double x, double y)

      Parameters:

      y - y amount to move by

      windowHeight - height of window
